    ReturnResult 一些工具类.
    Since:
    1.11.0
    Author:
    feilong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ReturnResult<Object> buildFailureResult(String statusCode)
      构造带statusCode 的失败结果.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • buildFailureResult

        public static ReturnResult<Object> buildFailureResult(String statusCode)
        构造带statusCode 的失败结果.

        示例:

        对于以下代码: 

         
 ReturnResult returnResult = new ReturnResult();
 
 returnResult.setResult(false);
 returnResult.setStatusCode("member.email.error");
 return returnResult;
        此时可以重构成: 
         return ReturnResultBuilder.buildFailureResult("member.email.error");
        Parameters:
        statusCode - 返回状态码
        Returns:
        如果 statusCode 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        如果 statusCode 是blank,抛出 IllegalArgumentException
